nonTechnicalEvents.title: Surprise Event
nonTechnicalEvents.name: HERA’S TRAILS
nonTechnicalEvents.description: Hera, being the queen of the gods, can represent authority and unpredictability, symbolizing a challenge that tests various abilities.

nonTechnicalEvents.title: Photography Event
nonTechnicalEvents.name: APPOLO’S LUMINOUS LENS
nonTechnicalEvents.description: 'Luminous' adds a more dynamic and radiant feel, making it stand out while still connecting with Apollo’s association with light and creativity in photography.

nonTechnicalEvents.title: Treasure Hunt
nonTechnicalEvents.name: ARTEMIS' ADVENTURE
nonTechnicalEvents.description: This adds an air of intrigue and excitement, enhancing the adventurous theme of the treasure hunt!

nonTechnicalEvents.title: IT Manager
nonTechnicalEvents.name: HADES' TECH AUTHORITY
nonTechnicalEvents.description: Emphasizes leadership and management in the IT field, while still connecting to Hades' powerful presence.

nonTechnicalEvents.title: IT Quiz
nonTechnicalEvents.name: ATHENA'S ARENA
nonTechnicalEvents.description: Athena, goddess of wisdom, perfectly fits an arena where knowledge is tested.
